page.title: 11Some More Shops.
page.content: {THE BUTCHER'S}-3 people work there.It is quite big.They sell meat and vegetables. Frozen chickens cost 80p per lb, Topside costs Â£2.08 per lb, Stewing Steak costs Â£1.30 per lb.Mr.& Mrs.N.Hansford own this shop and next door. Mrs.V.Wade works for them. {THE {NEWSAGENT'S }-1 person works there,next to the Butcher's.They sell crisps,sweets,cards and newspapers. {THE HAIRDRESSER'S}- 2 people work there. They cut hair, wash hair, blow dry hair or do perms to curl hair.They also sell ladies clothes in the front part. Mrs.Manning owns this shop. {THE CUBBY HOLE}- Its a new little shop where 1 person works. She sells clothes for ladies,children and babies also jewellery. The clothes are sweet for the babies.Mrs.V.Wilcox serves.
